Class JExpress

java.lang.Object
JExpress
public class JExpress extends Object
An express.js-like application framework, requires Java 17 Compile the application with : javac JExpress.java Run the application with : java JExpress Get the documentation with : javadoc -d ../doc JExpress.java

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    JExpress.Callback
    A callback called to process a HTTP request in order to create a HTTP response.
    static interface 
    JExpress.Request
    A HTTP request
    static interface 
    JExpress.Response
    A HTTP response

    • express

      public static JExpress express()

      Returns:

    • get

      public void get(String path, JExpress.Callback callback)
      Routes an HTTP request if the HTTP method is GET.
      Parameters:
      path - a string representation of a path with interpolation.
      callback - a callback called when a client emits a HTTP request to create an HTTP response.

      Parameters:

      Throws:
